code: import React from"react";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CurrentWeather=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;if(!data)return null;const{current,location}=data;const date=new Date(current.last_updated);const formattedDate=date.toLocaleDateString("en-US",{month:"short",day:"2-digit",year:"numeric"});const dayOfWeek=date.toLocaleDateString("en-US",{weekday:"long"});const formattedTime=date.toLocaleTimeString("en-US",{hour:"numeric",minute:"numeric",hour12:true});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"card-title",children:[location.name,", ",location.region,", ",location.country]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:[formattedDate,", ",dayOfWeek," ",formattedTime]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:current.condition.icon,alt:current.condition.text,className:"me-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"mb-0",children:[current.temp_f,"\xB0F"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-0",children:current.condition.text})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Feels Like: ",current.feelslike_f,"\xB0F"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Wind: ",current.wind_mph," mph ",current.wind_dir]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Humidity: ",current.humidity,"%"]})]})});};export default CurrentWeather;
